::Epyon/Hot Rod::

As he was coming down on Nightstrike, Epyon's wing shields were spread.
Dragoon's shots struck those doing no damage to Epyon himself.

Hot Rod used his boosters and took flight. He came around a few trees,
and ended up behind Dragoon. He came down attempting to clobber Dragoon,
with a forarm shot to the back of the head.
